type-select.title: Type of Seller
type-select.subtitle: Please select the type of seller you are applying as.

info.title: Information
info.content: This choice is important for billing purposes. If you cannot issue an invoice with the Turkish Revenue Administration (you do not have a tax identification number registered in the Republic of Turkiye), you can choose individual. In this case, you will need to be a citizen of the Republic of Turkiye.

corporation.title: Corporation
corporation.subtitle: I am applying as a corporation.

individual.title: Individual
individual.subtitle: I am applying as an individual.

corporation.taxNumberInfo: Your tax number is the number on your tax card. This data will be kept encrypted and will not be shared with third parties.

individual.identityNumberInfo: Your identity number is the number on your identity card. This data will be kept encrypted and will not be shared with third parties.
individual.serialNumberInfo: Your serial number is the serial number on your identity card. This data will be kept encrypted and will not be shared with third parties.

general.realName: Real Name (Will shown on seller profile)
